languages.text: "Нет, Версериан, есть только закон Бога-Императора, и я подчиняюсь лишь ему. Странно, что вы хоть на миг могли подумать иначе".

traits.locale_text: "Нет, Версериан, есть только закон Бога-Императора, и я подчиняюсь лишь ему. Странно, что вы хоть на миг могли подумать иначе".

languages.text: "You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's Law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised you would think it might be otherwise."
languages.original_text: "Нет, Версериан, есть только закон Бога-Императора, и я подчиняюсь лишь ему. Странно, что вы хоть на миг могли подумать иначе".

traits.locale_text: "You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised that you would think it might be otherwise."
"You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised that you would think it might be otherwise."
"You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised that you would think it might be otherwise."
"You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised that you would think it might be otherwise."
"You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's Law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised you would think it might be otherwise."
"You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's Law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised you would think it might be otherwise."

languages.text: 「お前は勘違いしているぞ、ウェルザリアン。法とはただひとつ―神帝陛下の法のみ。俺が従うのは、それだけだ。それ以外の可能性があると、お前が考えていたことに驚いている」
languages.original_text: "You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's Law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised you would think it might be otherwise."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は勘違いしているぞ、ウェルザリアン。法とはただひとつ―神帝陛下の法のみ。俺が従うのは、それだけだ。それ以外の可能性があると、お前が考えていたことに驚いている」

languages.text: "Ihr irrt Euch, Werserian. Es gibt nur das Gesetz des Gottimperators, darum ist das auch das einzige Gesetz, das ich je befolgen werde. Es überrascht mich, dass Ihr etwas anderes denkt."
languages.original_text: "You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's Law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised you would think it might be otherwise."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr irrt Euch, Werserian. Es gibt nur das Gesetz des Gottimperators, darum ist das auch das einzige Gesetz, das ich je befolgen werde. Es überrascht mich, dass Ihr etwas anderes denkt."

languages.text: « Vous vous trompez, Werserian. La seule loi qui existe est celle de l'Empereur-Dieu, je ne peux donc me soumettre à aucune autre. Vous devriez pourtant savoir qu'il ne peut en être autrement. »
languages.original_text: "You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's Law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised you would think it might be otherwise."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous trompez, Werserian. La seule loi qui existe est celle de l'Empereur-Dieu, je ne peux donc me soumettre à aucune autre. Vous devriez pourtant savoir qu'il ne peut en être autrement. »
« Vous vous trompez, Werserian. La seule loi qui existe est celle de l'Empereur-Dieu, je ne peux donc me soumettre à aucune autre. Vous devriez pourtant savoir qu'il ne peut en être autrement. »

languages.text: «Se equivoca, Werserian. Solo existe la ley del Dios Emperador, lo que significa que será la única ley que obedeceré jamás. Me sorprende que crea lo contrario».
languages.original_text: "You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's Law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised you would think it might be otherwise."

traits.locale_text: «Se equivoca, Werserian. Solo existe la ley del Dios Emperador, lo que significa que será la única ley que obedeceré jamás. Me sorprende que crea lo contrario».

languages.text: “你错了，韦尔森总领。这世上唯一的律法，就是神皇的律法，也是我唯一要遵守的律法。你竟然会有其他看法，我真的相当惊讶。”
languages.original_text: "You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's Law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised you would think it might be otherwise."

traits.locale_text: “你错了，韦尔森总领。这世上唯一的律法，就是神皇的律法，也是我唯一要遵守的律法。你竟然会有其他看法，我真的相当惊讶。”

languages.text: "Yanlışın var Werserian. Tanrı İmparator'un Yasası'ndan başka kanun yoktur, bir tek onlara riayet ederim. Aksini düşünmene şaşırdım doğrusu."
languages.original_text: "You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's Law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised you would think it might be otherwise."

traits.locale_text: "Yanlışın var Werserian. Tanrı İmparator'un Yasası'ndan başka kanun yoktur, bir tek onlara riayet ederim. Aksini düşünmene şaşırdım doğrusu."
"Yanlışın var Werserian. Tanrı İmparator'unki yegâne kanundur, yani bir tek O'nun kanununa riayet ederim. Aksini düşünmene şaşırdım doğrusu."

languages.original_text: "You are mistaken, Werserian. There is only the God-Emperor's Law, which means it is the only law I will ever obey. I am surprised that you would think it might be otherwise."
